title: Finding the point of no return: Sun's shifting, spiky atmospheric boundary mapped in detail for 1st time
description: Scientists have created the first detailed maps of the sun's atmospheric boundary, where solar material breaks free and streams into space.
content: Scientists have created the first detailed maps of the sun's atmospheric boundary, where solar material breaks free and streams into space.
